title: Instructional Design Practical Skills Enhancement: History Inquiry Mastery Course Utilizing Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of world history and basic proficiency in operating digital devices
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain causal relationships of historical events through game simulations with over 80% accuracy
Students can reproduce 50 key historical terms with 90% accuracy through in-game quiz systems
Students can fully apply creative strategies in team-based historical problem-solving activities to produce project deliverables
Students achieve a 20% improvement in achievement by repeating learning content at least three times using game feedback systems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
